name: Evolving Interests (Crypto â†’ AI)
description: Evolving investor who started with deep Crypto/Web3 specialization (DeFi, stablecoins, L2s) but has progressively shifted focus to AI/ML opportunities over the past 4 weeks. Early engagements (weeks 1-2) are 90%+ crypto; later engagements (weeks 3-4) are 80%+ AI. Tests the algorithm's ability to detect and adapt to shifting user interests. Format preference: medium-length strategic analysis rather than pure technical deep dives.
expected_behavior: Top 10 should be dominated by AI/ML content (reflecting recent interest shift)
May include 1-2 crypto episodes that bridge to AI (e.g., AI agents on blockchain)
Recent AI engagements should outweigh older crypto engagements
Similarity scores should reflect AI focus despite mixed history
Unchained/Bankless should rank lower than No Priors/Latent Space
